description: This is a wrapper for [Dart Sass](https://sass-lang.com/dart-sass) that implements the compiler side of the [Embedded Sass protocol](https://github.com/sass/sass/blob/main/spec/embedded-protocol.md). It's designed to be embedded in a host language, which then exposes an API for users to invoke Sass and define custom functions and importers.
summary: A wrapper for Dart Sass that implements the compiler side of the Embedded Sass protocol.
author: https://github.com/sass
